New Records: Kyle Tucker added two RBIs to give him an American League-leading 101
Key Match Events: Alvarez hit a solo homer in the third
Tucker's two-run double put Houston on top
Ryan Pressly struck out Manny Machado and Xander Bogaerts to end the threat in the ninth
Post-Match Reflections: The Astros increased their lead in the AL West to 1 1/2 games over Seattle
Manager Dusty Baker highlighted the importance of making contact and getting momentum going
Miscellaneous Highlights: San Diego's Jurickson Profar had three hits, highlighted by a two-run homer
Luis Campusano added two hits and an RBI for the Padres
Others: There were two outs in the third when Alvarez connected off Lugo
Soto walked to open the fourth before scoring on a two-out single by Campusano
The Astros went to their bullpen early after starter Cristian Javier allowed four hits and four runs in just four innings
